        public static TextFormat text()

      • get

        public Result<String> get(Message<?> message)
        Description copied from interface: Format
        Retrieves a structured body from a message.

        Processing failure should be reported using the following HTTP status codes:

        • Response.UnsupportedMediaType for missing bodies;
        • Response.BadRequest for malformed bodies, unless a more specific status code is available.

        The default implementation returns a failure reporting the Response.UnsupportedMediaType status, unless explicitly overridden

        Specified by:
        get in interface Format<String>
        Parameters:
        message - the message the structured body managed by this format is to be retrieved from
        Returns:
        a result providing access to the textual representation of message, as retrieved from the reader supplied by its ReaderFormat body, if one is present; a failure describing the processing error, otherwise

      • set

        public <T extends Message<T>> T set(T message)
        Configures the WriterFormat body of message to write the textual value to the output stream supplied by the accepted output stream supplier.
        Specified by:
        set in interface Format<String>
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of message
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be configured to hold a structured body managed by this format
        Returns:
        the configured message
